Derek Bentley
Finance, Project Manager

Having started at PWC, Derek gained invaluable experience in finance and accounting and he provides a steadying and experienced hand that keeps the business on a sound financial footing. His former management consulting experience also gave him useful project management skills that enable him to drive a range of projects as the business grows.

Derek is very even-tempered, organized, and consultative. He works best in a team environment that allows him to showcase his ability to manage holistically with an understanding of how each area interconnects.
